title: Interdisciplinary Problem-Solving Workshop for Sustainability Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals and practitioners with diverse academic backgrounds, interested in solving sustainability issues through mathematical modeling

learning_goals: Learners can express sustainability issues (climate change, resource management, etc.) through mathematical modeling
Learners can design data-driven problem-solving solutions through interdisciplinary team collaboration
Learners can evaluate and present project results using quantitative and qualitative metrics
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
